trans:
Friends go out to dance
And they dance spectacularly
Friends go out to dance
And they dance spectacularly
Swing and swing like a coconut tree

Swing and swing like a coconut tree
Swing and swing like a coconut tree
Swing, swing and swing up

Swing, swing and swing to the side
